titleStmt.title: The way to peace A funeral sermon on Job 22.21. Preached upon the decease of the right honourable Elizabeth, Countess of Ranalagh. By Daniel Burgess.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Daniel, 1645-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for Jonathan Robinson, in St. Paul's Church-Yard, and Brab. Ailmer in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
